thread.section_title: TelephoneNigeria.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TelephoneNigeria.com | telephonenigeria.com
thread.title: Sandra Balogun

author: Sandra Balogun
title: Sandra Balogun
text: I sent a mobile recharge to a Nigerian account, my account was debited of course, the recipient did not receive the credit - $25.00 worth. The money sounds small but it's so disgusting that after 2 days, no one has responded to my emails, there is no customer service phone number for me to call and I'm thinking - THIS IS THE LAST TIME I EVER TRANSACT WITH THIS COMPANY. It's just disgusting, rude, and u acceptable. Was supposed to be a surprise birthday gift for my sister.
